news.title: Apple’s executive shake-up continues with departures of general counsel and policy head
news.summary: Apple loses two more top senior executives with exits of longtime general counsel Kate Adams and environmental VP Lisa Jackson. Meta’s Jennifer Newstead is set to join as new general counsel in 2026.

news.title: Anthropic CEO weighs in on AI bubble talk and risk-taking among competitors
news.summary: Anthropic's CEO shared his thoughts on the economics of AI and the risk-taking of competitors, saying some were "YOLO-ing" with regard to spending.

news.title: Musk says new Tesla software allows texting and driving, which is illegal in most states
news.summary: Texting while driving is banned in nearly every state, even with the use of advanced driver-assistance systems like Tesla's Full Self-Driving (Supervised) software.

news.title: From the NFL to Startup Battlefield: How Alltroo built a brand that wins
news.summary: On season one of Build Mode: Product, Meet Market, we explore what it really takes to get your product into the hands of customers.

news.title: Legal AI startup Harvey confirms $8B valuation
news.summary: Harvey confirms a third enormous round of funding in 2025 that has skyrocketed its valuation. Again.

news.title: Apple announces even more major executive turnover

news.title: Nintendo’s Switch 2 Mario Kart bundle is on sale at Amazon again for $50 off
news.summary: One of the biggest surprises of Cyber Monday was the terrific discount we saw on the Nintendo Switch 2 Mario Kart World bundle, which dropped in price by $50. news.title: Pentagon’s Signalgate report finds Pete Hegseth violated military policies
news.summary: It has been months since a group of Trump administration officials put together a Signal group chat to discuss classified military intelligence ahead of a military strike in Yemen while inadvertently adding a journalist, and now the Pentagon’s inspector general has released its report on the mess. news.summary: Tiny kei trucks from Japan have a new fan: President Donald Trump. news.title: Researchers find what makes AI chatbots politically persuasive
news.summary: A massive study of political persuasion shows AIs have, at best, a weak effect.

news.summary: Podcaster faces up to 70 years and a $3.5 million fine for ChatGPT-linked stalking.

news.title: Cloudflare Has Blocked 416 Billion AI Bot Requests Since July 1

news.title: What Happens When Your Coworkers Are AI Agents

news.title: Jon M. Chu Says AI Couldn’t Have Made One of Wicked’s Best Moments
